db:section.db:title: QMatrix2x2
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix2x2 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 2 columns, 2 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix2x3
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix2x3 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 2 columns, 3 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix2x4
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix2x4 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 2 columns, 4 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix3x2
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix3x2 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 3 columns, 2 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix3x3
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix3x3 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 3 columns, 3 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix3x4
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix3x4 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 3 columns, 4 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix4x2
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix4x2 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 4 columns, 2 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix4x3
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix4x3 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 4 columns, 3 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: int operator*(const int &matrix, int factor)
db:section.db:para: Returns the result of multiplying all elements of matrix by factor.

db:section.db:title: int operator*(int factor, const int &matrix)
db:section.db:para: Returns the result of multiplying all elements of matrix by factor.

db:section.db:title: int operator/(const int &matrix, int divisor)
db:section.db:para: Returns the result of dividing all elements of matrix by divisor.
